thread.title: Belvidere's Tommy Madeo is Week 6 New Jersey MVP
thread.title_full: Belvidere's Tommy Madeo is Week 6 New Jersey MVP

title: Belvidere's Tommy Madeo is Week 6 New Jersey MVP
text:
By Tom Hinkel | For lehighvalleylive.com on October 20, 2015 9:00 AM, updated October 20, 2015 9:47 AM 
lehighvalleylive Week 6 New Jersey Football Most Valuable Player Tommy Madeo (lehighvalleylive.com file photo) 
Tommy Madeo , Belvidere 
The senior running back/defensive back returned a kickoff and punt for touchdowns in a 42-0 romp over Manville. 
Madeo returned the opening kickoff 82 yards for a touchdown and ran back a punt 61 yards for a second quarter score. He ran for a 2-point conversion after the punt return. 
Madeo also rushed three times for 10 yards and caught one pass for 10 yards. 
Check out the high school football page for more Players of the Week and full coverage.
